### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Returns_and_Exchanges (
  return_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  return_date DATE,
  exchange_date DATE,
  return_reason VARCHAR(255),
  exchange_reason VARCHAR(255)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Returns_and_Exchanges SET return_reason = 'Defective Product' WHERE return_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE returns (
  return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  return_date DATE,
  item_id INT,
  return_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE exchanges (
  exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  exchange_date DATE,
  current_item_id INT,
  new_item_id INT,
  exchange_reason TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE returns SET return_date = '2023-01-10' WHERE return_id = 1;
